abstract: South Korean lawmakers call parliamentary hearing on family business squabbles of Lotte Group; two sons of Lotte Co chairman and founder Shin Kyuk-ho are feuding over $79 billion empire; sibling rifts at family companies can effect nation's economy.
lead_paragraph: Succession battles like the one at the Lotte Group shake global investors, who fear that a struggle for favor may expose multibillion-dollar companies to unnecessary upheaval.

headline.main: ‘War of Princes’ Sows Turmoil at South Korean Conglomerate
headline.print_headline: ‘War of Princes’ Disrupts a South Korean Conglomerate, Upsetting Investors

snippet: Succession battles like the one at the Lotte Group shake global investors, who fear that a struggle for favor may expose multibillion-dollar companies to unnecessary upheaval.
